channel.title: Chaotic weapons to 317 pi tragedy?
channel.description: is there anyway to succesfully add chaotic wepaons to 317 tragedy pi? ive been trying for bout 5 hours today ive failed miserably anyknow how or have a tut?

item.title: Chaotic weapons to 317 pi tragedy?
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

already posted this once.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

anyways, heres how you add chaotics to pi. download these and put them in your models/raw folder.

http://uppit.com/q5d92o9liihr/ChaoticMelee.rar

then add these to itemdef.java under hardcoded items.

[code]if(i == ****)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 35084;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35085;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35085;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic rapier”;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of amazing speed.”.getBytes();
itemDef.aByte205 = -11;
itemDef.aByte154 = -11;
break;

if(i == ****)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 35086;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35087;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35087;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1300;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic longsword”;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of incredible accuracy.”.getBytes();
itemDef.aByte205 = -11;
itemDef.aByte154 = -11;
break;

if(i == ****)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.aByte205 = -10;
itemDef.aByte154 = -10;
itemDef.modelID = 35088;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1360;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 354;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 2;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35089;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35089;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic maul”;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of brute strength.”.getBytes();
break;[/code]
if you get errors concerning the “break;”, change them to ending brackets.
